msContents.summary: Tax register, recording day by day the collection of money taxes.

msItemStruct.note: Pub. status: Recto; there are two lines on the Verso
+ P.Cair. Inv. 57187; P.Iand. VII, 141; P.Mich. Inv. 2830; 3159; 4910

condition.ab: Regularly cut at the left and right hand sides; The papyrus is badly broken at the top and bottom, which didn't affect the text much. A few spots of salt can be seen on the Recto and Verso. No restoration is needed. (MA)

handDesc.p: Written in a quick but clear cursive. The scribe separated a new entry from the preceding one by underlining the name of the tax payer. (MA)

origin.origPlace: Karanis, Herakleidou meris, Arsinoite nome, province of Egypt
origin.persName: Eutyches slave of Sarapias (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 165)
Horos, son of Anchorymphis, grandson of Horos, mother Achillis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 249)

Petheus, son of Harsiesis, grandson of Petheus, mother Tapetheus (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 201)

Kastor the son, mother Tapasion (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 182)

Valerios, bastard, mother Valeria (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 195)
Phasis, son of Heras, grandson of Orsenouphis, mother Isidora (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 246)
Limnaios, son of Onnophris, grandson of Satabous, mother Ptolema (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 185)

Pnepheros, son of Besis, grandson of Thoteus, mother Heras (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 212)
Pnepheros, son of Harphaesis, grandson of Pnepheros, mother Tapontos (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 212)
Sambas, son of Sokmenis, grandson of Sambas, mother Tkollainis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 224)

Chairemon, son of Chairemon, grandson of Sambas, mother Sokratiaina (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 247)

provenance.p: Karanis, Herakleidou meris, Arsinoite nome, province of Egypt

taxonomy.desc: APIS keywords are controlled locally at the institution level. They are not necessarily consistent.
